label: main_01
comment: 'Lightest Blue: Background for the largest/outermost container, or positive/good component.'

label: main_02
comment: 'Light Blue: Background for secondary containers (one level nested), or a standard component.'

label: main_03
comment: 'Mid Blue: Standard container fill, or a primary component focus.'

label: main_04
comment: 'Darkest Blue: Border/outline for main elements, or background for deep nesting.'

label: alt_01
comment: 'Lightest Orange: Background for contrasting outer container or secondary positive component.'

label: alt_02
comment: 'Light Orange: Background for contrasting secondary container or secondary component.'

label: highlight
comment: 'Yellow: To emphasize a specific relationship, flow, or active element.'

label: comment
comment: 'Gray: For annotations, notes, or deactivated elements.'

label: information
comment: 'Cyan/Teal: For supplemental data or non-critical details.'

label: warning
comment: 'Red: To signify errors, problems, or elements to be avoided.'

label: callout
comment: 'Bright Blue: For pop-up information or external links/references.'

label: neutral_border
comment: 'General purpose border for a neutral background.'

label: neutral_text
comment: 'Default dark text color for light backgrounds (Background/Border not applicable for text only).'
